item.title: This Classic 1962 Western Was The Best & Worst Of John Wayne & John Ford's Movie Partnership
item.description: John Wayne and John Ford had one of the greatest actor-director partnerships in movie history, but working together wasn't always easy for them.

item.title: James Gunn's Superman Being "Weak" Fixes A Decades-Old Complaint About The Man Of Steel
item.description: Some viewers of the new Superman trailers have complained that they make him look particularly weak, but it responds to a longstanding complaint.
